message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $120 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I'm not willing to go all the way down to $130, but I can meet you at $135. This is my final compromise
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $127.50?
I'm not willing to go below $137.50, as that's my minimum. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to get closer to my target
I'm willing to meet you at $137.50, but I'd really like to get a bit closer to my target price. Can you do $136?
I'm not willing to go below $138, as that's my minimum. I'm willing to make one last compromise, but I need to get closer to my target. How about we meet at $139?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm at my budget limit. I can offer $138, which is my final price. Will you accept?
